course_description: Every week there is a “Weekly Nerd🤓” where a partner or person comes and gives a talk. The talks are about subjects such as progressive enhancement or the company culture of the partner. We've had some very interesting people giving a talk. For example the founder of smashing magazine and one of the team members of the W3C.

talks.name: Vitaly Friedman
talks.subject: Bringing personality back to the web
